name: NP Membership
shortDescription: A simple way to stay connected and support.
detailedDescription:
• Basic newsletter subscription
  • Invitations to public events
  • Access to our community forum

This membership is perfect for those who want to stay informed and support without any financial commitment.

name: Bronze Membership
shortDescription: Support us and enjoy early access to updates.
detailedDescription:
• Everything in NP Membership
  • Early access to news and announcements
  • 10% discount on event tickets

Great for casual supporters who want a few extra perks.

name: Silver Membership
shortDescription: Enjoy exclusive content and priority support.
detailedDescription:
• Everything in Bronze Membership
  • Access to members-only content
  • Priority email support
  • Exclusive webinars

Ideal for those who want to be part of the inner circle and receive enhanced benefits.

name: Gold Membership
detailedDescription:
• Everything in Silver Membership
  • VIP invitations to private events
  • 1-on-1 consultation or mentorship sessions
  • Special recognition on our platform

The ultimate membership for those who want to make a meaningful impact and enjoy full access.
